conditions.warning: Some medications may not be safe during pregnancy. If you are pregnant or planning pregnancy, please confirm with your doctor.
Some medications may need dose adjustment with kidney problems. Consider discussing kidney function monitoring with your doctor.
Some medications may need dose adjustment with liver problems. Consider discussing liver function monitoring with your doctor.
Some medications may worsen breathing problems. Consider confirming with your doctor if you have asthma.
Some medications may affect blood sugar control. Consider monitoring blood sugar more frequently.

allergies.warning: If you have a penicillin allergy, please confirm with your pharmacist before taking this medication.
If you have a sulfa allergy, please confirm with your pharmacist before taking this medication.
If you have an aspirin allergy, please confirm with your pharmacist before taking pain relievers.
